post.text: Join me in Akron, Ohio - for a few minutes! TOGETHER- WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Emma
comment.text: I have noticed her jerking and I think Bill sounds pretty sick also. They don't need to be in the White House, they need to go to the hospital!!

replies.author: Clayton
replies.text: More like the infirmary ......in a penitentiary‼️ LOL

replies.author: Calvin
replies.text: So why is Trump always leaning on a podium
